id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID with which you will be able to reference the animation later in your display code.

*See also: [Animation](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#configuration-variables)*

file.docs:
**string**: The path (relative to where the .yaml file is) of the gif file.

*See also: [Animation](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#configuration-variables)*

resize.docs:
**string**: If set, this will resize all the frames to fit inside the given dimensions `WIDTHxHEIGHT` and preserve the aspect ratio.

*See also: [Animation](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#configuration-variables)*

BINARY.docs: Two colors, suitable for 1 color displays or 2 color image in color displays. Uses 1 bit per pixel, 8 pixels per byte.

GRAYSCALE.docs: Full scale grey. Uses 8 bits per pixel, 1 pixel per byte.

RGB24.docs: Full RGB color stored. Uses 3 bytes per pixel.

RGB565.docs: Lossy RGB color stored. Uses 2 bytes per pixel.

type.docs:
Specifies how to encode each frame internally. Defaults to `BINARY`.
  * `BINARY`: Two colors, suitable for 1 color displays or 2 color image in color displays. Uses 1 bit per pixel, 8 pixels per byte.
  
  * `GRAYSCALE`: Full scale grey. Uses 8 bits per pixel, 1 pixel per byte.
  
  * `RGB24`: Full RGB color stored. Uses 3 bytes per pixel.
  
  * `RGB565`: Lossy RGB color stored. Uses 2 bytes per pixel.
  
  

*See also: [Animation](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#configuration-variables)*
